an3.155:1: "Bhikkhus, those beings who engage in good conduct by body, speech, and mind in the morning have a good morning.
an3.155:2: Those beings who engage in good conduct by body, speech, and mind in the afternoon have a good afternoon.
an3.155:3: And those beings who engage in good conduct by body, speech, and mind in the evening have a good evening."
an3.155:4: Truly propitious and auspicious,a happy daybreak and a joyful rising,a precious moment and a blissful hourwill come for those who offer almsto those leading the spiritual life.
an3.155:5: Upright acts of body and speech,upright thoughts and aspirations:when one does what is uprightone gains upright benefits.
